text.section: Any first notice relating to failure to file reports of any type required in this chapter and any notices of rule motions shall be sent by the court or by the party making the motion to the attorney of record for the guardian.

If there is no attorney of record or a second or subsequent notice relating to failure to file reports, or any second or subsequent notice with regard to a rule motion, the notice shall be sent by the court or by the party making the motion to the guardian as well as to the attorney of record, if any, and the guardian.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 26, effective July 13, 1990.
